summary: Project investigating/fixing three.js canvas transparency: background turns black after GLTF model loads when Bloom/EffectComposer is enabled; fix requested to force clear alpha each frame.
architectural_notes: When using EffectComposer/UnrealBloomPass with a transparent canvas, force renderer alpha each frame (e.g., call gl.setClearAlpha(0) in useFrame) to prevent postprocessing/GLTF load from resetting clearAlpha to 1.
known_issues: Canvas background briefly shows site gradient, then turns black once GLTF model finishes loading when Bloom postprocessing is enabled (transparency lost).
